name: Sweetest Cornbread
author: Lisa Hamm
summary: This is a recipe for a very quick and easy cornbread that comes out of the oven so tender, moist, and very sweet! My family enjoys is with chili, jambalaya, ham and bean soup... the list goes on!
ingredients: 3 (7.5 ounce) packages cornbread mix (such as Jiffy®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Coat a 9x13-inch baking pan with cooking spray
Pour corn bread mix into a large bowl
Whisk milk and eggs together in a separate bowl and pour over the cornbread mix
Stir just enough so that all ingredients are incorporated
Pour in creamed corn and sugar
Stir gently until well incorporated, but do not overmix
Pour batter into the prepared baking pan
Melt butter in a microwave-safe bowl, about 30 seconds
Bake in the preheated oven until top is golden brown and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 30 to 40 minutes
